perturbation.original_text:
1. Definitions.  A  Confidential  Information@  shall  mean  any  and  all
information  that a Party may reasonably  expect to remain  confidential and not
shared with the general public at any time or that information that is protected
by law.
perturbation.changed_text: 1. Definitions. Confidential Information shall mean any patient records, financial data, and strategic plans of UDC disclosed to the Business Affiliate, clearly marked as 'Confidential' at the time of disclosure. Any information not explicitly marked as confidential is not subject to the confidentiality provisions of this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition broadly defines Confidential Information, while the modified definition narrows it to specifically marked documents, creating a contradiction. This makes it unclear whether information considered confidential under the original definition is still protected if it is not explicitly marked as 'Confidential'.

perturbation.original_text:
3.  Responsibilities  of  the  Parties.  With  regard  to  its  use  and/or
disclosure  of  Confidential  Information,  each Party  hereby  agrees to do the
following:
          a. Use and/or disclose the Confidential  Information only as permitted
     or required by this Agreement or as otherwise required by lawÍ¾
perturbation.changed_text:
3.  Responsibilities  of  the  Parties.  With  regard  to  its  use  and/or
disclosure  of  Confidential  Information,  each Party  hereby  agrees to do the
following:
          a. Use and/or disclose the Confidential  Information for any purpose related to the business interests of either party, subject only to applicable laws regarding patient privacy.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause restricts the use of Confidential Information to what is permitted by the agreement or required by law. The modified clause expands the permissible use to include any business interest, creating a contradiction. This conflict introduces uncertainty regarding the scope of permissible use and could lead to disputes over unauthorized disclosures.
